name: Paul Schneider
description: I’m thoughtful, kind, respectful, funny, but can be serious when needed. I am athletic, have some musical talent, and look younger than my age. I feel I am a well rounded individual with many interests and a thirst to learn new things. You can count on me to provide lots of laughs, intelligent conversation, an easy smile and a big hug when needed. I love affection, long slow kisses, and being a gentleman – I will treat you like a lady. I still feel young, healthy and full of life, and plan on staying that way for a long time.
